trans-unit.source: , provides display and RDF ingest of ERNE (EDRN Resource Network Exchange) specimens for the Early Detection Research Network (EDRN) Knowledge Environment (EKE). EDRN uses the EKE to make it easy to discover, share, search for, and retrieve all of EDRN’s collective knowledge, including cancers and other diseases, biomarkers, publications, investigators, participants, studies, protocols, and, as in the case of this product, specimens.
trans-unit.target: ，为早期检测研究网络（EDRN）知识环境（EKE）提供ERNE（EDRN资源网络交换）标本的显示和RDF提取。EDRN使用EKE使发现，共享，搜索和检索EDRN的所有集体知识变得容易，包括癌症和其他疾病，生物标志物，出版物，研究者，参与者，研究，方案，并且在这种情况下产品，标本。

trans-unit.source: This product,
This release addresses the following issue:
trans-unit.target: 该版本解决了以下问题:

trans-unit.source: This release addresses the following:
This release addresses:
This release also addresses the following issues:
trans-unit.target: 该版本还解决了以下问题:

trans-unit.source: This release handles:
This release makes eke.specimens compatible with Plone 4.
This release simplifies specimens so that only the common attributes between Specimen Reference Sets, PRoBE, and ERNE Specimens are represented.
trans-unit.target: 该版本简化了标本,因此只表示标本参考集、PRoBE和ERNE标本之间的共同属性。

trans-unit.source: This release tackles the following:

This release updates the GenericSetup profile to 4, provides upgrade steps to that profile, and makes the testing and development harness depend on “trunk” level of other eggs instead of on released versions of those eggs. It also takes advantage of factored out common testing setup.
trans-unit.target: 此版本将GenericSetup配置文件更新为4，提供了对该配置文件的升级步骤，并使测试和开发工具依赖于其他“鸡蛋”级别的其他鸡蛋，而不是依赖于这些鸡蛋的发行版本。它还利用了排除因素的通用测试设置。

trans-unit.source: This software is developed by the EDRN Informatics Center at JPL, operated by the California Institute of Technology, for NCI.
trans-unit.target: 该软件是由开发EDRN信息中心 的喷气推进实验室，由加州技术研究所的工作NCI。

trans-unit.source: This time around, the EKE specimen package provides direct display of ERNE specimen data without having to delegate to the ERNE UI web application. (There is no corresponding issue in the issue tracker for this new feature; or if there is, the issue tracker is down as I write this and can’t confirm.)
trans-unit.target: 这次，EKE标本包可直接显示ERNE标本数据，而无需委托ERNE UI Web应用程序。（问题跟踪器中没有此新功能的相应问题；或者，如果存在，我写此报告时问题跟踪器已关闭，无法确认。）

trans-unit.source: Use Buildout with the plone.recipe.zope2instance recipe.
Use refactored base.cfg
Use z3c.autoinclude

What follows is a history of changes from release to release. Within each description, you can find more details about cited issue numbers by visiting the issue tracker at https://oodt.jpl.nasa.gov/jira/browse/CA
trans-unit.target: 接下来是发行版本之间的变更历史。在每个描述中，您可以通过以下网址访问问题跟踪器来找到有关所引用问题编号的更多详细信息：https：//oodt.jpl.nasa.gov/jira/browse/CA

trans-unit.source: Work around vocabulary lookup caused by interaction of collection.vdexvocabulary-0.1.1 and Plone-4.3.
trans-unit.target: 解决因collection.vdexvocabulary-0.1.1和Plone-4.3的交互作用而导致的词汇查询问题。

trans-unit.source: You can mark generic sets as PRoBE sets.
trans-unit.target: 您可以将通用集标记为PRoBE集。

trans-unit.source: You can skip the ZCML slug if you are going to explicitly include the package from another package’s configure.zcml file.
trans-unit.target: 如果要从另一个软件包的configure.zcml文件中明确包含该软件包，则可以跳过ZCML插件。
